name: Tower Defense Game For Mobile [Prototype]
description:
This prototype tower defense game was made under de Intensive training from GameDevHQ, a training that lasted 8 weeks. 

Selected the weapon you want to place on the base that will be highlighted in yellow, once the enemy is near the line of attach of the weapon they will attack the enemy.  If you select the weapon on the field you can upgrade the weapon or dismantle it.

*NOTE*

The game has no escape / quit key or button. There can be bug on the game
